brainly_data.question: There are a total of 84 students in the robotics club and the science club. The science club has 12 more students than the robotics club. How many students are in the science club?
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: There are a total of 84 students in the robotics club and the science club. The science club has 12 more students than the robotics club. How many students are in the science club?
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
84 students in robotics and science club 
science club has 12 more than robotics club so 

84 - 12 = 72
72 / 2 = 36 
36 + 12 = 48 

48 in science club and 36 in robotics club
